stories.original_summary: Scientists have managed to observe solar neutrinos carrying out a rare atomic transformation deep underground, converting carbon-13 into nitrogen-13 inside the SNO+ detector. stories.fantasy_headline: Whispers of Sun-Sprites: Deep Earth Magic Transforms Elements!
stories.fantasy_story: Deep beneath the surface, the Alchemists' Guild has observed ethereal sun-sprites, tiny wisps from the heavens. These magical motes caused a rare transformation, turning earthly carbon into mystical nitrogen within a hidden chamber. By tracking faint glows, the wizards confirmed this low-energy elemental change.

stories.original_headline: Scientists find dark chocolate ingredient that slows aging
stories.original_summary: Scientists have uncovered a surprising link between dark chocolate and slower aging. A natural cocoa compound called theobromine was found in higher levels among people who appeared biologically younger than their real age.
stories.fantasy_headline: Mystic Cocoa Bean Grants Youthful Glow, Alchemists Discover!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a wondrous secret within the dark cocoa bean. They found a special essence, called theobromine, linked to a slower march of time. Those who consumed more of this enchanted treat often appeared younger than their true years, holding back the signs of age.
